startup.welcomeDescription: LMM-OA (or Life and Ministry Meeting Overseer Assistant) is an application designed for the Life and Ministry Meeting Overseer.
startup.congInfoDescription: Enter below the congregation name and number
startup.meetingInfoDescription: Enter below the meeting day of the midweek meeting, and the number of student classes
startup.setupCompleteDescription: Initial setup of LMM-OA is now completed. You could still change them later if needed.
startup.lmmoaDesc: Organize and manage the student schedule for the midweek meeting. Please read carefully the information below before using this application.
startup.whoUseApp: This application is designed for use by the Life and Ministry Meeting Overseer.
startup.disclaimerApp: Please note however that LMM-OA is not an official application for Jehovah’s Witnesses. You are free to choose whether to use it or not. We strongly recommend that its use has been approved by all the congregation elders. Also, we are aware that there are many similar applications currently available to help you to accomplish this task. We are not here to say what is the best and what is not. We believe all of these applications are good and have their own methods on how to do things, but still have the same goal.
startup.appPWA: LMM-OA is a PWA application. What does it means?
startup.descPWA: As a PWA, or progressive web application, LMM-OA is a type of application software delivered through the web. It is intended to work on any platform that uses a standards-compliant browser, including both desktop and mobile devices. Also, you can install it on your device, and it will work offline after you have finished the initial setup.
startup.appSecure: How secure is your data when you use LMM-OA?
startup.webChange: We are committed to providing you with a secure application that should allow you to carry your responsabilities in the congregation. In web development, technologies are changing rapidly, and we will do our best to keep the pace with those changes.
startup.appStorage: Although LMM-OA is a web application, please note that we are not storing your data online. They are all  saved locally on your browser device. That makes it possible to use this application even when you are offline.
startup.onlineShare: However, we have built some functionalities that will allow you to share data online, that is not confidential, for public and private access. For private share, all data are encrypted and securely saved on our server.
startup.indexedDB: As technical information, we are mainly using IndexedDB to save all LMM-OA data in your browser.
startup.clearBrowserData: Please be informed that when you are clearing your browser history, you are also deleting all your LMM-OA data. Unless you have made a backup, your data will be gone forever.
startup.appPrivacy: How LMM-OA is taking care of your privacy?
startup.dataCollection: When you accept to use our sws2apps applications, you give us the permission to collect the following informations: your name and email address. We are also collecting your device IP address, your user agent details to identify you when you access our server.
startup.adBlock: We do not allow any advertising companies to collect data through our services to target you with any ads. We do not share data collected by LMM-OA application with other organization for any purpose.
login.signInWithInternet: Sign in to your account. An internet connection is required.
login.newUserAccount: Create your account and an internet connection is required. Make sure to save the email and password in safe location. You will not be able to access your data in case you forget them
login.accountNotFound: The provided login does not exist yet.
login.accountExist: That email address is already taken
login.accountDisabled: The account that you are trying to access is currently disabled.
login.createFailed: An error occured and your account could not be created
login.accountCreated: Your account is created, but you have to check the verification email before using it.
login.accountCreatedNoLink: Your account is created, but we failed to send the verification email
login.accountNotVerified: This account is valid, but it is not yet verified. Please check your email address to verify it
login.accountNewLink: The verification email has been resent
login.hostBlocked: This device has been blocked from making any requests, try again later
login.incorrectInfo: Your username or password is incorrect
login.verifyAccount: An email message has been sent you to verify your account. You will not be able to use your account if it has not been verified yet. You may need to check the Spam or Junk Email folder. Resend the verification message in case you did not received it.
login.blockedAccount: This email address is blocked. Please verify that the information you provided are correct.
login.requestAccountSent: Your congregation account request has been successfully sent. Please allow up to 24 hours for it to be processed. You will receive an email address when it will be ready for use.
login.congregationRequestExist: You already sent a congregation request for this email address. We will send you a message when the request has been processed.
login.mfaSetupQr: Two-factor authentication is required. Scan the QR code below, using an authenticator app on your phone, like Microsoft Authenticator or Google Authenticator.
login.mfaSetupToken: Two-factor authentication is required. Copy the code below and add it manually to the authenticator app on your phone, like Microsoft Authenticator or Google Authenticator.
login.setupTextOTP: Then, enter below the OTP code generated from the app
login.copyToken: I cannot scan this QR Code
login.unauthorizedRole: You do not have yet the required role to use this application. Please contact your congregation administrators to confirm your role. They may send us an email if they need further support.

s89.title:
OUR CHRISTIAN LIFE AND MINISTRY
MEETING ASSIGNMENT
s89.descFooter: Note to student: The source material and study point for your assignment can be found in the Life and Ministry Meeting Workbook. Please work on the listed study point, which is discussed in the Teaching brochure.
settings.eraseDesc: Erase all data used by LMM-OA.
settings.deleteDbTitle: Are you sure to delete all LMM-OA data?
settings.deleteDbDesc: All data used by LMM-OA will be deleted. This includes the students list, schedules, and all congregation details.

settings.backupError: An error occured and your backup is not saved
settings.backupRetrieveFailed: An error occured while retrieving your backup

settings.backupOnlineNone: You do not yet have any backup stored online

settings.backupRestoreInvalidPassword: The password to open the backup data is incorrect
settings.backupRestoreError: An error occurred while processing your backup data
settings.backupInvalidFile: The file selected is not a valid backup for LMM-OA. Please choose the correct file
settings.restoreComplete: The backup data for LMM-OA has been successfully restored
settings.sendCongBackup: Send backup to be saved in your online congregation account
settings.lastCongBackup: Last backup made by {{ backup_person }}, on {{ backup_date }}. Please click CREATE if you want to make a new backup.

settings.restoreCongBackup: Restore backup from your online congregation account

settings.passwordNotEqual: The new passwords do not match

settings.twoFactorDesc: Two-factor authentication adds an additional layer of security to your account by requiring more than just a password to sign in.
settings.twoFactorApp: Use Microsoft Authenticator or Google Authenticator app in your new device to scan the code QR below
settings.twoFactorToken: If you are unable to scan the QR code, please use the token below
settings.sessionsDesc: This is a list of devices that have logged into your account. Revoke any sessions that you do not recognize.
administration.removeBrotherDesc: Are you sure to remove brother {{ name }} from the congregation? He will no longer have access to your congregation when he connects to his online account.
administration.accountNotFound: No user account has been found. Please make sure that the email address is correct. You can check with the user also if his account was already verified, and MFA was enabled.
administration.accountExist: This account is already a brother in your congregation.
administration.roleLMMOAssistant: Life and Ministry Meeting Overseer - Assistant
about.description: LMM-OA (Life and Ministry Meeting Overseer Assistant) is an application to coordinate and manage students assignment schedule for Midweek Meeting.
